caption: The movie tells the story of a mysterious African-American teenager from Spider-Man's perspective. He accidentally gains superpowers from an experiment and embarks on his superhero journey. Along the way, he learns about growth and responsibility, eventually becoming a true Spider-Man. Highlights: The teenager accidentally gains superpowers and starts his superhero journey. He faces challenges of growth and responsibility. During his growth, he receives guidance and help from Spider-Man. He eventually becomes a true Spider-Man. The film showcases his unique family and community background. At a celebration, his family and friends pay tribute to him. He also thanks his family and friends for their support and influence. The movie showcases his growth, responsibility, and close relationship with Spider-Man.

global.answer: No. It seems like an animated movie.
